channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 马克龙任命前能源署署长为未来亚欧走廊特使
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron named the former head of gas utility Engie as its special envoy to a multinational rail and ports project linking the Middle East and South Asia tipped as an alternative to China's Belt and Road initiative.翻译:法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙任命天然气公司前负责人恩吉为连接中东和南亚的跨国铁路和港口项目的特使，该项目被认为是中国“一带一路”倡议的替代方案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 全球股市创两年新高，美国通胀数据成为焦点
item.description: European stocks opened higher on Monday and world stocks were steady at their highest in more than two years, as investors waited for U.S. inflation data due this week to give clues about when the U.S. Federal Reserve might cut rates.翻译:欧洲股市周一高开，世界股市稳定在两年多来的最高水平，投资者等待本周公布的美国通胀数据，以提供有关美联储何时可能降息的线索。
item.author: Elizabeth Howcroft

item.title: 美元上涨，美国通胀数据成为本周的焦点
item.description: The dollar edged higher on Monday as a holiday in most major Asian markets subdued the start of what could turn into a busy week, with all eyes on U.S. inflation data for clues on when the Federal Reserve may start to cut rates.翻译:美元周一小幅走高，因为大多数主要亚洲市场的假期抑制了可能会变得忙碌的一周的开始，所有人都在关注美国通胀数据，以寻找美联储何时可能开始降息的线索。
item.author: Alun John

item.title: Stellantis利用欧洲剩余工厂作为与罗马战斗的筹码
item.description: A recent war of words between Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni and Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares has exposed a tough new reality: Europe's one-time homegrown national automakers have become global players ready to exploit the EU's overcapacity of car factories to obtain better government deals.翻译:意大利总理乔治亚·梅洛尼 (Giorgia Meloni) 和 Stellantis 首席执行官卡洛斯·塔瓦雷斯 (Carlos Tavares) 最近的口水战暴露了一个严峻的新现实：欧洲曾经的本土汽车制造商已成为全球参与者，准备利用欧盟汽车工厂的产能过剩来获得更好的政府交易。
item.author: Giulio Piovaccari, Nick Carey

item.title: 饱经战火的台湾岛屿主演奥斯卡提名电影
item.description: A film about frontline Taiwanese islands repeatedly fought over with China during the height of the Cold War is vying to win an Oscar this year.翻译:一部关于冷战最激烈时期台湾岛屿与中国大陆多次争夺前线的电影正在争夺今年的奥斯卡奖。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Fabian Hamacher

item.title: 中国选手潘勇创100米自由泳世界纪录
item.description: China's teen sensation Pan Zhanle set the men's 100 metres freestyle world record at the swimming World Championships in Doha on Sunday with a stunning leadoff swim in the 4x100m relay to power his nation to the title.翻译:周日，在多哈举行的游泳世锦赛上，中国少年选手潘战乐在 4x100 米接力比赛中表现出色，创造了男子 100 米自由泳世界纪录，为中国队夺得冠军提供了动力。
item.author: Ian Ransom

item.title: 独家：小米称印度对中国企业的审查令供应商感到不安
item.description: China's Xiaomi has told the Indian government that its heavy scrutiny of Chinese companies has made smartphone component suppliers wary about setting up operations in India, according to a letter and a source with direct knowledge of the matter.翻译:据一封信函和一位直接了解情况的消息人士称，中国小米已向印度政府表示，其对中国公司的严格审查使得智能手机零部件供应商对在印度设立业务持谨慎态度。
item.author: Aditya Kalra, Munsif Vengattil

item.title: 菲律宾指责中国在黄岩岛附近进行危险演习
item.description: The Philippines' coast guard (PCG) on Sunday accused China of "dangerous and blocking" manoeuvres while its vessel patrolled near Scarborough Shoal in the South China Sea this month.翻译:菲律宾海岸警卫队周日指责中国船只本月在南海黄岩岛附近巡逻时进行了“危险和封锁”的演习。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报告称更多中国气球飞越台湾海峡
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Sunday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, of which five flew across Taiwan, the second day in a row is has reported a large number of balloons.翻译:台湾国防部周日表示，过去24小时内检测到8个中国气球穿越台湾海峡，其中5个飞越台湾，连续第二天报告大量气球。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 共和党中国委员会主席加拉格尔从美国国会退休
item.description: U.S. Representative Mike Gallagher, who chairs the House select committee on competition with China, said on Saturday he will not run for re-election, four days after he was one of only four House Republicans to buck party leadership and vote against impeaching President Joe Biden's top border official.翻译:众议院对华竞争特别委员会主席、美国众议员迈克·加拉格尔 (Mike Gallagher) 周六表示，他不会竞选连任，四天前，他是仅有的四名反对党派领导并投票反对弹劾总统乔·拜登 (JoeBiden) 的众议院共和党人之一。最高边境官员。
item.author: Patricia Zengerle

item.title: 由于梅西的影响仍在继续，北京取消了阿根廷友谊赛
item.description: Argentina's friendly against Ivory Coast, scheduled to be held in Beijing in March, has been cancelled, the Chinese city's football association said on Saturday, following a backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in a match in Hong Kong.翻译:中国足协周六表示，原定于三月在北京举行的阿根廷对阵科特迪瓦的友谊赛已被取消，此前梅西未能参加在香港的比赛引发了强烈反对。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: JSW 集团将在印度东部设立近 50 亿美元的电动汽车项目
item.description: India's JSW Group will set up electric vehicles and battery manufacturing projects in the country's eastern state of Odisha at a cost of 400 billion rupees ($4.82 billion).翻译:印度JSW集团将在该国东部奥里萨邦建立电动汽车和电池制造项目，耗资4000亿卢比（48.2亿美元）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾报道新年假期开始时出现中国气球
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Saturday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, two of which flew across the island, in an uptick of activity at the start of the Lunar New Year holiday.翻译:台湾国防部周六表示，在过去 24 小时内发现了 8 个中国气球穿越台湾海峡，其中两个气球飞越台湾岛，农历新年假期开始时活动有所增加。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 乌克兰援助法案在美国参议院取得进展
item.description: If the legislation passes the Senate, it will face an uncertain future in the Republican-controlled House, where Speaker Mike Johnson has indicated he could split the aid into separate bills.翻译:如果该法案在参议院获得通过，它将在共和党控制的众议院面临不确定的未来，众议院议长迈克·约翰逊表示，他可以将援助分成单独的法案。
item.author: David Morgan

item.title: 华南城表示 2024 年 10 月票据付款可能出现违约
item.description: Property developer China South City Holdings said on Friday it is likely to default on the mandatory redemption payment due on Feb. 9 for its 9% Senior Notes due October 2024, citing depressed sales and cash flow.翻译:房地产开发商华南城控股周五表示，由于销售和现金流低迷，该公司可能会拖欠2月9日到期的2024年10月到期的9%优先票据的强制赎回付款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 巴斯夫因权利记录审查退出中国新疆合资企业
item.description: BASF said on Friday that it would sell its stakes in two joint ventures in the Chinese region of Xinjiang, where human rights groups have documented abuses including forced labour in detention camps.翻译:巴斯夫周五表示，将出售其在中国新疆地区两家合资企业的股份，该地区的人权组织记录了包括拘留营强迫劳动在内的虐待行为。
item.author: Ludwig Burger

item.title: 资生堂利润下滑，中国消费者低迷又成为受害者
item.description: Shiseido became the latest victim on Friday of a slowing Chinese economy that has battered earnings at many global consumer goods companies, when the Japanese cosmetics maker reported a 40% slide in annual earnings.翻译:上周五，资生堂成为中国经济放缓的最新受害者，这家日本化妆品制造商报告称，其年盈利下滑了 40%，中国经济放缓已经打击了许多全球消费品公司的盈利。
item.author: Rocky Swift

item.title: 政策支持下1月份银行新增贷款创历史新高
item.description: New bank loans in China jumped by more than expected to an all-time high in January, as the central bank moved to shore up the sputtering economy, reinforcing expectations for more stimulus in the coming months.翻译:随着央行采取行动提振陷入困境的经济，中国一月份新增银行贷款增幅超出预期，创历史新高，强化了未来几个月出台更多刺激措施的预期。
item.author: Judy Hua, Kevin Yao

item.title: 随着中国经济困境加剧，投资银行准备迎接更多亚洲裁员
item.description: Job cuts at Western investment banks in Asia are expected to increase this year as revenue pressures rise due to deepening economic and market turmoil in China, even as deal prospects brighten in Japan and India, headhunters and bankers said.翻译:猎头公司和银行家表示，尽管日本和印度的交易前景光明，但由于中国经济和市场动荡加剧，收入压力加大，亚洲西方投行今年的裁员预计将增加。
item.author: Kane Wu, Selena Li

item.title: 百度与联想达成第三笔中国人工智能智能手机交易
item.description: China's Baidu has partnered with Lenovo to feature its generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology on Lenovo's smartphones, in the latest team up with a phone manufacturer as it seeks practical applications for its AI model.翻译:中国的百度与联想合作，将其生成式人工智能（AI）技术应用到联想的智能手机上，这是与手机制造商的最新合作，旨在为其人工智能模型寻求实际应用。
item.author: Josh Ye
